name: Fox: Escape from the Lab
description:
This is 3D puzzle "use environment". The Beast (the Fox for now) must fix the puzzles in each room in the secret Lab. The items in the Lab is very unpleasant:

- fire throwning tubes

- high voltage teslas

- teleporters

- elevators

- bowls with different liquids

Now games contain only 30 levels. Project is in developing.

The placement here is to test the game idea.

Completely NO any shocking content.
